data.name: DC Wonder: Unlimited Demo
data.detailed_description:
In a different dimension, there was a band that perfected the art of music. That band was known as DC Wonder. As a reward for their success, they were granted the powers of their favorite warriors by the Muses; the Goddesses of Music. Full of excitement, the members of DC Wonder decide to organize a friendly tournament to test their new gifts. However, the rise of their fame created jealousy in the previous top musician of their world; Dustin. But his despair does not last, for Eris; Goddess of chaos has summoned Nemesis; the Goddess of vengeance and convinced her to grant him a power as well. With his new abilities, Dustin captures the band, and scatters them across the world to keep them apart. Will he succeed in breaking up the band? Fight your way to the top and defeat Dustin to put him in his place!

- Tournament-style arcade mode.
- Compatible with USB controllers.
data.about_the_game:
In a different dimension, there was a band that perfected the art of music. That band was known as DC Wonder. As a reward for their success, they were granted the powers of their favorite warriors by the Muses; the Goddesses of Music. Full of excitement, the members of DC Wonder decide to organize a friendly tournament to test their new gifts. However, the rise of their fame created jealousy in the previous top musician of their world; Dustin. But his despair does not last, for Eris; Goddess of chaos has summoned Nemesis; the Goddess of vengeance and convinced her to grant him a power as well. With his new abilities, Dustin captures the band, and scatters them across the world to keep them apart. Will he succeed in breaking up the band? Fight your way to the top and defeat Dustin to put him in his place!

- Tournament-style arcade mode.
- Compatible with USB controllers.
data.short_description: This is a 1v1, 2D fighting game featuring the members of the DC Wonder pop band, which controls somewhat like Super Smash Bros. in that every character has a small number of moves that can be strung together. Try the game with the man who made the music; Frank Watkoskey.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 2000
  • Processor: Pentium III 400MHz, 128 MB RAM
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with 32 MB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 7.0
  • Storage: 583 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Compatible with 4-button controller
